Reviews.Title: European Plug, not US!
Reviews.Author: craftmom2012
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before choosing this phone, but didn't see anything that lead me to believe it was a phone with a European plug.  We were very sad to see that when we opened up the box and tried to plug it in in the US.  This should have been put in the product description so it would be obvious not to purchase this phone if you are not European.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Michael M.
Reviews.Content: A very good and reliable phone to use. Tho phone is very easy to use and has a good networking abilities.
